TopicTitle: Can squad pass to n-body gravity models?

Articles.Content: I know it doesn't matter a lot to most players, but can squad change their model of gravity to calculate all the planets gravities instead of using patched conics? and if not, is there a mod for that?

Hi.

No, N-body physics isn't currently planned for the stock game, and has been suggested so many times it's in the [What Not To Suggest](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest) list.

The forum user [eggrobin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/members/4682-eggrobin) is still hammering away on an N-body mod that he's naming [Principia](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/68502), however I couldn't tell you what state it's in.

I'll also move this thread to Suggestions and Development Discussion. Normally a thread asking about N-body would just get closed, however I'll leave it open for now, simply because I'm going to try and contact eggrobin to see if he wants to chime in (chirp in?) with some information on his mod.
